meanings.definition: A person or business that sells goods kept in stock.
meanings.sent1: The local stockist always has a variety of products available for purchase.
meanings.sent2: I visited the stockist to buy some new stationery for school.
meanings.sent3: The stockist joked that they had so many items in stock, they could open a second store!
meanings.sent4: Her shop was like a treasure trove, a stockist of all things beautiful and unique.
meanings.sent5: The stockist's shelves were overflowing with merchandise, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A retailer or distributor that keeps a supply of goods for sale.
meanings.sent1: The stockist in the mall offers a wide range of clothing brands.
meanings.sent2: As a stockist, he ensures that the latest tech gadgets are always in stock.
meanings.sent3: The stockist playfully challenged customers to try and buy everything in the store.
meanings.sent4: The stockist's store was a hub of activity, buzzing with eager shoppers.
meanings.sent5: In the world of fashion, she was known as the ultimate stockist of designer labels.
